_sid.%comment%: A fillable Unique Identifier of a Scene to distinguish the scene

_slabel.%comment%: A fillable Optional text field for scene description in 50 words

_scenearea.%comment%: defines the boundaries of the virtual play area to consittute multiple playareas where articles and scene users interact with length, breadth, height ending up in a cube or cuboid.

_playarea.%comment%: defines the boundaries of the virtual play area where articles and scene users interact with length, breadth, height ending up in a cube or cuboid. The size of playarea should be less than scenearea.

_camera.%comment%: true for yes, false for no. This is to set initial camera in the scene

_initialpos.%comment%: provide camera initial position in x,y,z coordinate values in a 3D plane with {0,0,0} as center horizon

_horizon.%comment%: true for yes, false for no. This is to set horizon sun to map the terrian with real world

_dof.%comment%: accepts two values 3 and 6. Throw errors for the rest of the values

_skybox.%comment%: accepts two values 3 and 6. Throw errors for the rest of the values

_controllers.%comment%: accepts three multip type values haptic_wrist, hand, haptic_limb, haptic_obody, haptic_null. Throw errors for the rest of the values

_gravity.%comment%: Allows earth gravity ground, else provide value in meter per second

_interaction.%comment%: This describes the interaction capacity in the scene.

_nestedscene.%comment%: To understand the nested scenes, their count and id values with cross validation

_audio.%comment%: true for spatial audio, false for no spatial audio

_timeline.%comment%: true for timed scene with dynamic events, false for a static scene with static events
